title: Summer Memories
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>How about this, Nozomi-san? Is it too tight anywhere?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>No, it’s fine.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Okay then, you’re all dressed up!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Thank you, You-chan. Summer is all about yukata, right~. The peony pattern on this yukata is super cute too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Well, I picked a Yukata that would be a perfect fit for you together with Karin-san and Kotori-chan, after all! It really does suit you, Nozomi-san! Aaah, I’m so happy that we can all go to the summer festival in yukata! I’m so pumped up~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Fufu, what are you looking forward to the most at the festival, You-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Let’s see~. First, there’s eating takoyaki from the food stalls, then I also want to eat chocolate bananas! After that.... Ah, cotton candies!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Ahaha, all food, huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>What about you, Nozomi-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Me? I look forward to taking a picture with everyone. Your morning glory patterned yukata also really suits you, You-chan. So I want to leave a lasting memory of how cute you are, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
